sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>river</radical> radical and the <kanji>river</kanji> kanji are the same as each other!
meaningInfo: So, if you know the radical you know the kanji as well.
readingMnemonic: You're standing next to a <kanji>river</kanji> that's actually used as a <reading>ca</reading>r <reading>wa</reading>sh (<ja>かわ</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine standing by the river, watching all those cars floating by. They start off really dirty, but the river washes them all clean.
